CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests UISourceCode display name.

UISourceCode display name for url "http://localhost:8080/folder/filename?parameter=value&nnn=1" is "filename?parameter=value&nnn=1".
UISourceCode display name for url "http://localhost:8080/folder/very-long-filename-123456?nn=1" is "very-long-filename-123456?nn=1".
UISourceCode display name for url "http://localhost:8080/folder/too-long-filename-1234567890?nn=1" is "too-long-filena…234567890?nn=1".
UISourceCode display name for url "http://localhost:8080/folder/long-filename?parameter=value&nnn=1" is "long-filename?p…er=value&nnn=1".
UISourceCode display name for url "http://localhost:8080/folder/too-long-filename-1234567890?parameter=value&nnn=1" is "too-long-filena…er=value&nnn=1".
